value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Baneling Bust INTELLIGENTLY! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Baneling Busting is one of the easiest Zerg all-ins in the game. Most Zerg players are aware of this strategy and realise that it works great on the lower part of the ladder in Zerg versus Terran, Zerg versus Protoss and Zerg versus Zerg. value.title: How to deal with LADDER ANXIETY in StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I get asked "How do I beat Ladder Anxiety" all the time so I made a video which hopefully answers a lot of people's questions! Ladder anxiety is rooted in many things but I've summed it up into three distinct causes: 1) those who are new to RTS/SC2, 2) those who anchor their ego to a certain skill level,

value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 008 - Applying Pressure
value.excerpt: Constantly scout your opponent, and don't be afraid to apply pressure.  By keeping your opponent pinned, you create opportunities to get further ahead.
